remarks: Membership in an element of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2016.)
statement:
abfmpel.1 $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> { y | ph } ) $.
abfmpel.2 $e |- { y | ph } e. _V $.
abfmpel.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
abfmpel $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( B e. ( F ` A ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W y $.
$d ps x y $.
